response.overview: Soviet and Kazakhstani boxer, popular film actor, two-time boxing champion of the USSR (1970-1971), Abdrashit Abdrakhmanov is the first of Kazakhstani boxers to receive the title of master of sports of international class. Winner of the USSR Cup in 1969. Winner of international boxing tournaments in America, Europe, Africa. The film allows you to look at the hero from the other side. His wife Lyudmila Abdrakhmanova helps to see and feel the hero. Only she knows what efforts it took Abdrashit Khakimovich to overcome all difficulties and become who he is.
response.title: Abdrashit Abdrakhmanov. Love of All Life
